quotes.message: The employee is regarded by the employer merely in the light of his value as an operative. His productive capacity alone is taken into account.
quotes.name: Leland Stanford

quotes.message: Employee engagement is an investment we make for the privilege of staying in business.
quotes.name: Ian Hutchinson

quotes.message: Resources are hired to give results, not reasons.
quotes.name: Amit Kalantri

quotes.message: Employees who are controlled cannot respond caringly, you need superior knowledge and real leadership, not management. Because of this we specifically developed a selection process for leaders; we don't hire managers.
quotes.name: Horst Schulze

quotes.message: Employee of the month is a good example of how somebody can be both a winner and a loser at the same time.
quotes.name: Demetri Martin

quotes.message: Employee fathers need to step up to the plate and put their family needs on the table.
quotes.name: James Levine

quotes.message: Every employee must be essential to the functions of the organization.
quotes.name: Brian Tracy

quotes.message: Employers have gone away from the idea that an employee is a long-term asset to the company, someone to be nurtured and developed, to a new notion that they are disposable.
quotes.name: Barbara Ehrenreich

quotes.message: People want to know they matter and they want to be treated as people. That's the new talent contract.
quotes.name: Pamela Stroko

quotes.message: Your work is to discover your work and then with all your heart to give yourself to it.
quotes.name: Buddha

quotes.message: The way your employees feel is the way your customers will feel. And if your employees don't feel valued, neither will your customers.
quotes.name: Sybil F. Stershic

quotes.message: If we consistently exceed the expectations of employees, they will consistently exceed the expectations of our customers.
quotes.name: Shep Hyken

quotes.message: Employment was invented to make education seem useful.
quotes.name: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.message: Motivating employees to work at their full potential is the main premise of successful management.
quotes.name: Eraldo Banovac

quotes.message: The five steps in teaching an employee new skills are preparation, explanation, showing, observation and supervision.
quotes.name: Bruce Barton

quotes.message: Employees who believe that management is concerned about them as a whole person - not just an employee - are more productive, more satisfied, more fulfilled. Satisfied employees mean satisfied customers, which leads to profitability.
quotes.name: Anne M. Mulcahy

quotes.message: Most employees are smarter than their employers. All employers are braver than their employees.
quotes.name: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.message: Understanding your employee's perspective can go a long way towards increasing productivity and happiness.
quotes.name: Kathryn Minshew

quotes.message: If you fulfill the wishes of your employees, the employees will fulfill your visions.
quotes.name: Amit Kalantri

quotes.message: Every employee, not just the senior people, should know how a company is doing.
quotes.name: Jack Welch

quotes.message: Employee participation programs and employee ownership are important efforts to deal with powerlessness at work.
quotes.name: Daniel Yankelovich

quotes.message: Your assets are your employees. Invest more on those performing well. Let the non performers go.
quotes.name: Manoj Arora

quotes.message: A great employee is like a four leaf clover, hard to find and lucky to have.
quotes.name: Tammy Cohen

quotes.message: Employees who don't feel significant rarely make significant contributions.
quotes.name: Mark Sanborn

quotes.message: You cannot love an employee into creativity, although you can avoid his dissatisfactions with the way you treat him.
quotes.name: Frederick Herzberg

quotes.message: For employee success, loyalty and integrity are equally as important as ability.
quotes.name: Harry F. Banks

quotes.message: Realize that employees and the customers both have to be engaged, at the same time, to move your business forward for sustainable success.
quotes.name: Robert G. Thompson

quotes.message: One mistake employees do is to work for the employers' success at their own expense.
quotes.name: John Muhaise Bikalemesa

quotes.message: An employee's motivation is a direct result of the sum of interactions with his or her manager.
quotes.name: Bob Nelson

quotes.message: Treat employees like partners, and they act like partners.
quotes.name: Fred Allen

quotes.message: Every employee can affect your company's brand, not just the front-line employees that are paid to talk to your customers.
quotes.name: Tony Hsieh

quotes.message: Being an employee is a bad outcome. You want to avoid that. Being an employee is never a good outcome. That's just an opinion.
quotes.name: Kevin O'Leary
